trigger: User sends food-related message → AI responds → Post-processing extracts nutrition

dataFlow.request: Chat Routes → processNutritionData → nutritionInferenceService.extractNutritionFromText → DateContextParser.parseDateContext → NutritionData validation
dataFlow.response: Validated NutritionData → formatForStorage → storage.createNutritionDataFromInference → Health database

errorPaths.parsing: Returns null for invalid nutrition content
errorPaths.validation: Zod schema validation with detailed error messages
errorPaths.extraction: Graceful fallback to empty nutrition data

extractNutritionFromText.description: Main entry point for nutrition extraction from AI responses with date context parsing
extractNutritionFromText.validation: Uses zod schema for data validation
extractNutritionFromText.enhancement: Now includes automatic date context parsing for temporal food references

parseNutritionValues.description: Uses regex patterns to extract nutrition values from text

determineConfidence.description: Calculates confidence level based on various factors

levels.medium: AI estimates with approximations or image analysis
levels.low: General food mentions without specific values

determineSource.description: Identifies the source of nutrition information

extractFoodItems.method: Pattern matching against common food database

parseDateContext.description: Parses date context from conversation text using DateContextParser
parseDateContext.returns: DateContext object with parsed date and confidence
parseDateContext.validation: Validates parsed dates are within reasonable range (30 days past, 7 days future)

formatForStorage.description: Formats nutrition data for health_data table storage

output.metadata: JSON metadata with confidence, source, meal type, date context, etc.

createNutritionDataFromInference.description: Stores inferred nutrition data as individual health data entries
createNutritionDataFromInference.returns: HealthData[] array of created nutrition entries
functionality: Creates individual health_data records for each nutrition component (calories, protein, carbs, fat, fiber, sugar, sodium)
Assigns nutrition category to all entries

nutritionDataSchema.dateContext: object (optional) - confidence, source, originalText of date parsing

validationRules.nutritionValues: All nutrition values must be positive numbers within realistic ranges
validationRules.confidence: Must be one of: high, medium, low
validationRules.source: Must be one of: user_provided, ai_inferred, photo_analysis

integrationPoints.aiService: Enhanced system prompts in chat-context-service.ts provide nutrition analysis capabilities
integrationPoints.healthDataStorage: Stores extracted nutrition data in health_data table using storage.createNutritionDataFromInference
integrationPoints.chatPostProcessing: Integrated into chat-routes.ts streaming and non-streaming endpoints
integrationPoints.memorySystem: Nutrition patterns stored in memory for better inference

postProcessingPipeline.description: Automatic nutrition data extraction from AI chat responses
postProcessingPipeline.integration: Called after AI response is saved in both streaming and non-streaming endpoints
postProcessingPipeline.storage: Each nutrition component stored as separate health_data record with nutrition category
postProcessingPipeline.errorHandling: Non-blocking background processing with error logging

metadata.conversationId: Links nutrition data to chat conversation

aiPromptEnhancements.description: Enhanced AI system prompts with nutrition analysis capabilities
features: Food identification from text and images
Nutritional value estimation with confidence levels
Structured output format for easy parsing
Photo analysis guidance for food images
Example responses for different food scenarios

outputFormat.structure: Estimated calories: X kcal, Protein: X grams, etc.

performanceConsiderations.regexOptimization: Optimized regex patterns for fast nutrition value extraction
performanceConsiderations.validationCaching: Zod schema validation with minimal overhead
performanceConsiderations.memoryUsage: Lightweight service with minimal memory footprint

securityConsiderations.inputValidation: All extracted values validated against realistic ranges
securityConsiderations.dataIntegrity: Zod schema ensures data structure integrity

unitTests: Date parsing from explicit formats (MM/DD, MM/DD/YYYY)
integrationTests: End-to-end nutrition extraction from AI responses
Date context integration with nutrition inference

dateContextParser.description: Standalone utility for parsing date context from natural language
capabilities: Relative date parsing (today, yesterday, X days ago)
Day of week parsing (last Monday, this Friday)
Time of day parsing (morning, afternoon, evening)

validation.fallback: Current date if parsing fails or out of range
